column5: Does anyone know the water level of the English River system in the Kenora area?
Here's a link that reports precipitation, water level and flows for the entire basin. Just pick out the one(s) you are interested in:http://www.lwcb.ca/waterflowdata.html Chuck
Thanks Chuck..Ive seen that..I just dont know what the normal level is to be able to determine how high it is..or maybe I just dont know how to read it

We just got back from the English River on the far west end. Caribou Falls and White Dog dams are moving a lot of water through them. Lake levels on Umfreville (behind Caribou Falls) are at the high end of the normal range.
